Supervised
- categorical - classification - image classification
- continuous - regression  - sales prediction
unsupevised
- discrte - clustering - knn - add campaigin testing
- contrinous - dim reduction - PCA - feature extract
reinforcement
- categorial target - classifiaction - personalized recommendation - amazon.com
- reward +/i - control - auto robots


discrete / continous ?
- supervised learning 
target / no-target


recommend enging - classification - reinfore
control - env interaction - reinfore


model - perf or model
algo - speed and quality of process
auto model tuning - hyper tuning - best version of model 


Steps 
- get and engin data into dataset
- randomize
- split
- chose best algo
- load algo container
- chose compute
- create instsance of model
- set hyper paramet
- fit and deplot

deploy
- persitent endpoint - https for infernce 
- batch transform - for entire dataset (uses agent)

evalute 
- performance and accuracy

- k-fold - holdoutset
- online -production variants

auto, linear, log hyparameter - >0 log < revers log 0-1.
